problem.title: Why leads are lost today
problem.item1: Bio is chaos: pricing, booking, and cases scattered across posts and links
problem.item2: People ask the same questions, you answer manually and lose time
problem.item3: A page becomes a menu of links, not a path to booking
problem.item4: No understanding: what actually gets clicked and where attention is lost
problem.solution: lnkmx creates one clear page where visitors quickly understand who you are, how you help, how much it costs, and where to click to book. And you see leads and analytics in one place.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to popular questions about lnkmx

q1.question: What is lnkmx and who is it for?
q1.answer: lnkmx is an AI builder for link in bio pages and mini-sites that helps you collect links, services, and lead forms in one place.

q2.question: How much does lnkmx cost?
q2.answer: The basic plan is free forever. Pro: 3 months - 4,350‚Ç∏/mo, 6 months - 3,500‚Ç∏/mo, 12 months - 2,610‚Ç∏/mo. Online payment and 14-day refund.

q3.question: How does AI page generation work?
q3.answer: Pick a niche and share a few details - AI builds the structure, copy, and CTAs in minutes. Free: 1 generation/month, Pro: 5/month.

q4.question: What blocks are available?
q4.answer: 20+ blocks: profile, links, buttons, images, video, carousels, products, price lists, forms, maps, messengers, reviews, FAQ, timers, and more.

q5.question: Do you have CRM and analytics?
q5.answer: Yes. Pro includes CRM for leads and Telegram notifications. Analytics show clicks, sources, and behavior.

q6.question: Is there a mobile editor?
q6.answer: Yes. You can edit your page directly from your phone.

q7.question: What integrations are supported?
q7.answer: Telegram for lead alerts and Google Calendar for scheduling. Socials and messengers are available as blocks.

q8.question: Do you take a commission on sales?
q8.answer: No. 0% commission on your sales - you only pay the subscription.

q9.question: How can I pay for Pro?
q9.answer: Pay by card and available payment methods. You can also use tokens (100 tokens = 1 day Pro).

q10.question: What is the refund policy?
q10.answer: Refunds are available within 14 days of payment according to local regulations. See the user agreement for details.

q11.question: Can I see real examples?
q11.answer: Yes. The gallery features real pages from creators, shops, and service providers.

q12.question: How is lnkmx different from Linktree or Taplink?
q12.answer: lnkmx includes AI page creation, CRM, and notifications without extra fees, plus flexible blocks and local languages.

q13.question: Is lnkmx suitable for shops or services?
q13.answer: Yes. Add a catalog, pricing, lead forms, and contact buttons to speed up booking or orders.

q14.question: Can I connect my own domain?
q14.answer: Yes, Pro includes custom domains and branding.

whenToChoose.title: When to choose lnkmx
whenToChoose.item1: You need one link that leads to a booking, not a link list.
whenToChoose.item2: You want to capture leads and manage them in a mini-CRM.
whenToChoose.item3: You want to launch fast without designers or code.
whenToChoose.item4: You need analytics by blocks and traffic sources.
whenToChoose.item5: You work in RU and KK and need localized pricing.

whenNotToChoose.title: When lnkmx might not fit
whenNotToChoose.item1: You need a complex multi-page website with custom logic.
whenNotToChoose.item2: You require full control over HTML and hosting.
whenNotToChoose.item3: You only want social links without lead capture.
